summary: Driven by curiosity, I explore new possibilities and embrace challenges. As a child, I tinkered with electronics, fueling my desire to understand the world and create. Discovering art in my teens became my sanctuary, leading me to combine it with technology for immersive experiences. Early in my career, I mastered HTML, CSS, and WordPress, merging art and tech./ Recently, I delved into JavaScript and React, showcasing problem-solving abilities and passion for dynamic user interfaces. Now, I aim to collaborate with like-minded individuals and organizations, leveraging my diverse skill set for positive impact. With a proven track record and commitment to growth, I use technology to amplify ideas, spread creativity, and contribute to meaningful endeavors.
shortSummary: Experienced and passionate designer and web developer with a background in art and a natural inclination for technology and progress

experience.title: Product Designer and Developer
description: Developed responsive websites and engaging graphics for individuals and businesses around Philadelphia.
Worked collaboratively with clients to understand their specific needs and goals, and delivering solutions that exceed expectations.
Continually improving my skills with new technologies and techniques.

experience.title: Customer Relationship Management Specialist
description: Proficiently coded HTML design documents for TotalExpert's marketing collateral platform.
Managed, assigned, and scheduled emails, social media posts, and print pieces for successful campaigns.
Conducted archival of old pieces to declutter the company's collateral database.
Contributed to the development of complex email Journeys used by hundreds of Loan Officers.
Worked collaboratively with legal and compliance teams to edit and approve/deny custom content requests.
Resolved ServiceNow support tickets, providing prompt and effective solutions to technical issues.
Played a key role in training new team members, sharing knowledge and best practices.
Demonstrated outstanding ability to manage tasks and responsibilities without direct supervision.

experience.title: Web Designer and Art Director
description: Formulated business concepts for startup nonprofit, providing insights and perspectives.
Researched culture, cuisine, and nonprofits, identifying growth opportunities.
Built custom WordPress website on a tight budget for a high-quality online presence.
Designed, created, and posted visually appealing marketing collateral using Adobe software.
Performed administrative tasks such as equipment management and organizing documents.
Demonstrated strong project management skills, ensuring timely delivery of initiatives.
Identified areas for improvement and implemented solutions to streamline processes.

rite.title: Rite
rite.subtitle: 2D Assets for a puzzle platformer game
rite.description: In 2015, I worked in a small team to create the prototype of a 2D puzzle platformer game called Rite. I was responsible for creating the game's 2D assets, including the main character, enemies, and environment.

SIGGRAPH.title: SIGGRAPH Promotional Materials
SIGGRAPH.subtitle: Video and print design for graphics researchers
SIGGRAPH.description: In 2019 and 2020, I was responsible for creating both print designs to be used in official SIGGRAPH publications, as well as promotional videos for the team's research projects. I worked closely with the team's researchers to understand their work and create designs that effectively communicated their key findings.

clickbait.title: clickbait
clickbait.subtitle: a nonsensical, AI-powered multiplayer browser game about writing the news with your friends
clickbait.description: Between November 2022 and April 2023, I developed clickbAIt, a JavaScript game written in ReactJS and socket.io and based on the rules of the party game 'The Exquisite Corpse.' I designed and developed the game's front- and back-end, and it is currently playable on itch.io.

Built custom website in WordPress on tight budget. Designed and posted marketing collateral with Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign.
